title: The Adventure Zone: Amnesty - Episode 5
description: Our heroes band together to hunt down the Beast terrorizing the woods outside Kepler. Ned remembers a fateful night. Aubrey receives a letter. Duck feels the weight of destiny.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (The McElroys)
